channel.title: Turmoil PK - 317 Private Server
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][font=impact]Welcome to Turmoil PK[/font][/size]
Info: -This server was inspired by an old server known as Pkerslyfe. -The server will be running off of a VPS and will be running 24/7. -The server is a 317 based client and will be featuring very few custom items. -We have a small player base currently featuring a few staff members.
[size=24pt][font=impact]Combat[/font][/size]
[IMG]http://goo.gl/9GNvD[/img] Melee -Fully working Dragon Claws, Armadyl Godsword, Whip.
[IMG]http://goo.gl/JXwxM[/img] Ranged -Work in progress.
[IMG]http://goo.gl/WTXyH[/img] Magic -Fully working Ancient Magicks. -Semi-working Lunar Spells.
[IMG]http://goo.gl/u48AJ[/img] Prayer -Fully working regular prayers and Turmoil. -Perfect burying bone animations.
[size=24pt]Mini-Games[/size]
Pest Control -Semi-working gameplay. -Custom rewards. -7 points per game.
Fight Pits -Fully working fight pits. -Custom rewards.
Duel Arena -Fully working duel arena.
Barrows -Work in progress.
[size=24pt]Staff Members[/size]
[IMG]http://goo.gl/2WkLC[/img]Developers -Lyric -Chiah -Divinity
[IMG]http://goo.gl/uwX2S[/img]Advisor -None
[IMG]http://goo.gl/5t2LK[/img]Admin -Example32
[IMG]http://goo.gl/wgCZQ[/img]Moderator -None
[size=24pt]Pictures[/size] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/23u96xt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/qqd74n.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9rnb6o.png[/img]
[size=24pt]Bugs[/size]
Known bugs:
-Incorrect animations for unarmed combat. -Clipping. -You can log-out during a stake and stay in the arena.
[size=24pt]We are currently looking for an experienced programmer to help develop the server. If anyone is interested PM me.[/size][/center]

item.title: Turmoil PK - 317 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Turmoil_PK1 Turmoil_PK
item.description:
@Turmoil_PK1 wrote:

[center][size=36pt][font=impact]Welcome to Turmoil PK[/font][/size]

Info:
-This server was inspired by an old server known as Pkerslyfe.
-The server will be running off of a VPS and will be running 24/7.
-The server is a 317 based client and will be featuring very few custom items.
-We have a small player base currently featuring a few staff members.

[size=24pt][font=impact]Combat[/font][/size]

Melee
-Fully working Dragon Claws, Armadyl Godsword, Whip.

Ranged
-Work in progress.

Magic
-Fully working Ancient Magicks.
-Semi-working Lunar Spells.

Prayer
-Fully working regular prayers and Turmoil.
-Perfect burying bone animations.

[size=24pt]Mini-Games[/size]

Pest Control
-Semi-working gameplay.
-Custom rewards.
-7 points per game.

Fight Pits
-Fully working fight pits.
-Custom rewards.

Duel Arena
-Fully working duel arena.

Barrows
-Work in progress.

[size=24pt]Staff Members[/size]

Developers
-Lyric
-Chiah
-Divinity

Advisor
-None

Admin
-Example32

Moderator
-None

[size=24pt]Pictures[/size]

23u96xt.png765×504

qqd74n.png764×506

9rnb6o.png767×505

[size=24pt]Bugs[/size]

Known bugs:

-Incorrect animations for unarmed combat.
-Clipping.
-You can log-out during a stake and stay in the arena.

[size=24pt]We are currently looking for an experienced programmer to help develop the server.
If anyone is interested PM me.[/size][/center]

Read full topic
